column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Look Cool in School Uniform ( Muslim Girls )
#Text=Are you a Muslim who wants to look cool in their school uniform ?
#Text=This article may just help you .
#Text=We will give you tips and loads on how to achieve this !
#Text=Steps
#Text=Choose the right clothing
#Text=Your school may give you loads of different options in uniform like wearing trousers or skirts and clothe like that .
#Text=Choosing true right one if very important .
#Text=Wear trousers !
#Text=Trousers are probably the best clothing to wear when you have a headscarf on your head as wearing a skirt may look a bit odd .
#Text=Make sure your clothes fit you nicely !
#Text=You do n't want to be wearing big clothing as it might look a bit odd as well !
#Text=Depends how it would look on you wear the right type of trousers .
#Text=Maybe try on some skinny trousers or see if you can wear jeans ( this is if your allowed to wear these type of clothes . )
#Text=Maybe roll up the sleeves of the shirt your wearing under your blazer ( if your wearing a blazer . )
#Text=It will make you look quite laid back about everything .
#Text=Another important thing about your clothing is your shoes .
#Text=Shoes can make a very huge difference in your clothing !
#Text=Wear trainers !
#Text=If your school allows you to wear these type of stuff then do take advantage of it .
#Text=Wearing trainers can really make you look so much cooler .
#Text=But make sure you choose the right type of trainers because some trainers may just ruin your look .
#Text=Maybe get a friend or someone to give their opinion about the trainers you choose and how they think it looks with your uniform .
#Text=If your school is very strict maybe wearing trainers wo n't be allowed .
#Text=The best type of shoes for you would probably be shoes that are n't like those ones where it 's got that one strap that you open and close .
#Text=Also ballet type of shoes are n't that good as well .
#Text=Get one where like you ca n't see the like top of the feet if that 's how you say it .
#Text=Wear socks !
#Text=But not any type of socks .
#Text=Get socks that go up to your ankle .
#Text=They do make you look cooler if they are seen .
#Text=Get a good bag
#Text=Getting the right bag is very important !
#Text=You must carefully choose one that will shout out your personality !
#Text=Get a Nike , Adidas or like Ellesse bag .
#Text=These companies bags can make you look much cooler because they are quite popular companies and will make you look good .
#Text=These type of bags are good for people who are sporty .
#Text=Get a a quite basic bag .
#Text=Maybe with pastel colours if you wan na maybe give that cute touch to your look .
#Text=If your the kind of sweet/cute type of person .
#Text=Getting one of those hype bags that have lots of different things on it can make you look quite creative or arty .
#Text=The right headscarf
#Text=Make sure you have a good headscarf and know how to put it on properly .
#Text=Here are some tips
#Text=If your school is strict about colours and only want you to wear certain colours then you will have to choose from these colours .
#Text=Try these different colours and see how they look on you .
#Text=If you can choose your colours then you can try colours that go well with your uniform .
#Text=Do n't wear a bright pink headscarf when your uniform is green .
#Text=Tips
#Text=When you choose a bag it will present your personality .
#Text=If the bag is n't your type then do n't buy it because honestly it 's not you .
#Text=When choosing a headscarf it 's not only about he colour .
#Text=It 's also about the type of the headscarf .
#Text=If its thick it will look differently on you than it will if it 's thin .
#Text=Warnings
#Text=Make sure that everything you wear is allowed in your school .
